name: Deep Breath
description: Calms the body and mind with focused breathing.
howToPerform: Inhale slowly through your nose for 4 seconds, hold for 4 seconds, exhale through your mouth for 4 seconds. Repeat 4 times.

name: Grounding Stone
description: Re-centers your awareness using the five senses.
howToPerform: Name 5 things you can see, 4 you can touch, 3 you can hear, 2 you can smell, and 1 you can taste.
